check something ↔ off.translation[0].def: to write a mark next to something on a list to show that you have chosen it, dealt with it, or made sure that it is correct
One by one he checked them off on his register.
check something ↔ off.translation[1].def: to write a mark next to an item on a list, showing that you have dealt with it or it is correct
Check people’s names off as they arrive.
